resources.string: Moral Reminders
Welcome to Moral Reminders!

We focus so much on our differences, and that is creating a lot of chaos and negativity and bullying in the world. And if we all focused on what we all have in common, which is we all want to be happy.
Bullying just shows one's insecurities.
Bullying creates character like nuclear waster creates superheroes. It's a rare occurrence and often does much more damage than endowment.
Victims of bullying spare themselves distress, by detachment; denying their ability to experience happiness.
Your pain may be the reason for somebody's laugh, but your laugh should never be the reason for somebody's pain.
You will never reach higher ground if you are always pushing others down.

Watch your thoughts, they become words. Watch your words, they become actions. Watch your actions, they become habits. Watch your habits, they become character. Watch your character, for it becomes your destiny.
Knowing what's right doesn't do much unless you do what's right.
Never do the wrong thing to make a friend or keep one.
Often the right part is one that may be the hardest for your to follow. But the hard path is also the one that will make you grow as a human being.
Never be bullied into silence, never allow yourself to be a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
Don't take anything personally, nothing other people do is because of your, it is because of themselves.
How you make others feel about themselves says a lot about you.
A beautiful person is a person with a good heart, if you have a good heart, there is no way you can be ugly.
Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
What if the person you bully today, grows up and turns out to be the only surgeon that could save your life?
People who love themselves, don't hate others. The more we hate ourselves, the more we want others to suffer.
Life is like a fight, but not everyone's a fighter. Otherwise bullies would be an endangered species.
You should never make fun of something that a person can never change about themselves.
People try to say suicide is the most cowardly act a man could ever commit. I don't think that is true at all. What's cowardly is treating a man so badly that he wants to commit suicide.
We rise by lifting others.
Your are either as beautiful or as ugly as your feel you are. You define your beauty. That's not a power anyone can have over your.
The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up. -Mark Twain-
Smile often, think positively, give thanks, laugh loudly, love others, dream big.
Work hard and be kind, that is all.
You may go through a difficult time. Where you feel like a failure, but remember one thing, struggle and hard times are the most inspirational thing in the world.
Never lose your sense of wonder.
Compliment people. Magnify their strengths, not their weaknesses.
People who wonder whether the glass is half-empty or half-full are missing the point. The glass is half full.
It's ok to be a glowstick. Sometimes we need to break before we shine.
